title: 【冷子の文言文】校恋之果
author: 正义の冷子
txt_content:
QQ空间又是闹哪样啊 网恋？



学校同学恩恩爱爱

replies.author: 正义の冷子
replies.txt_content: 标题: 【冷子の文言文】校恋之果自暑,吾班有对鸳鸯齐飞。甚亲热,于QQ 空间亲昵不断,连秀恩爱半月。吾甚恶之,一日,一同学以扒别人裤子,诬是受唆报击情敌,举两人有不常联系。遂拆散

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
QQ空间又是闹哪样啊 网恋？





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: what_name
replies.txt_content:
有一个最简单的方法
单次执行:scoreboard teams add Love 
scoreboard teams join Love 那对情侣
rcb:execute @a[team=Love] ~ ~ ~ /execute @a[r=8,team=Love] ~ ~ ~ /kill @a[r=8,team=Love]
靠近就死2333
